fr-FR.This is the default application home pag: Voici la page d'accueil par défaut d'une application
fr-FR.An application is a collection of pages: Une application est une collection de pages et de processus qui répond à un besoin métier. Elle contient certains ou tous les éléments suivants :
fr-FR.the frame in which application pages are: Structure dans laquelle les pages de l'application sont affichées
fr-FR.the user interface components of the app: Composants de l'interface utilisateur de l'application. Une application doit contenir au moins une page
fr-FR.the logic execution components of the ap: Composants de la logique d'exécution de l'application. Une application doit contenir au moins un processus.
fr-FR.which are the user interface of the proc: qui représentent l'interface utilisateur du processus
fr-FR.called from pages or forms to retrieve d: appelées par les pages ou les formulaires pour ramener les données à afficher à l'utilisateur
fr-FR.the appearance of application pages, inc: l'apparence des pages de l'application, qui inclut les polices de caractères et les couleurs.
fr-FR.The definition of applications should be: Les applications doivent être définies dans le Studio, pour faciliter leur développement et leur packaging avec les autres éléments
fr-FR.For Enterprise, Efficiency and Performan: Dans les éditions Enterpirse, Efficiency, et Performance, un éditeur graphique est fourni en plus du code source xml.
fr-FR.For more details, go to: Pour plus d'informations, consultez la page de documentation
fr-FR.Title: Titre
fr-FR.Name: Nom
fr-FR.This field length should be larger: Ce champ doit contenir plus de caractères
fr-FR.This field length should be smaller: Ce champ doit contenir moins de caractères
fr-FR.This value is too small: La valeur de ce champ est trop petite
fr-FR.This value is too large: La valeur de ce champ est trop grande
fr-FR.Toggle the text area to HTML source code: Basculer l'affichage du texte vers HTML / Rich Text
fr-FR.Heading: Titre
fr-FR.Quote/unquote selection or paragraph: Formater le paragraphe ou la sélection en citation
fr-FR.Please enter an image URL to insert: Saisissez l'URL de l'image à insérer
fr-FR.Please enter a youtube URL to embed: Saisissez une URL YouTube à embarquer
fr-FR.The requested content cannot be loaded.<:
Le contenu demandé ne peut pas être téléchargé.
Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

es-ES.This is the default application home pag: Esta es la homepage por defecto de la aplicación
es-ES.An application is a collection of pages: Una aplicación es una colección de paginas y procesos que cumple un objetivo de negocio. Contiene varios o todos los elementos siguientes:
es-ES.the frame in which application pages are: el frame en el cual las páginas de la aplicación se mostrarán.
es-ES.the user interface components of the app: los componentes de interfaz de usuario de una aplicación. Una aplicación debe contener al menos una página.
es-ES.the logic execution components of the ap: los componentes de lógica de ejecucion de la aplicación. Una aplicación debe contener al menos un proceso.
es-ES.which are the user interface of the proc: que son la interfaz de usario del proceso
es-ES.called from pages or forms to retrieve d: llamadas desde páginas o formularios para obtener la información a mostrar al usuario.
es-ES.the appearance of application pages, inc: la apariencia de las páginas de aplicación, incluyendo fuentes y colores.
es-ES.The definition of applications should be: La definición de aplicaciones debe ser realizada desde el studio, lo que hace más directo el desarrollo y empaquetado con otros elementos de la aplicación.
es-ES.For Enterprise, Efficiency and Performan: Para las ediciones Enterprise, Efficiency y Performance, se agrega un editor gráfico para editar el codigo fuente en xml.
es-ES.Title: Título
es-ES.Name: Nombre
es-ES.This field length should be larger: La longitud de este campo debería ser mayor
es-ES.This field length should be smaller: La longitud de este campo debería ser menor
es-ES.This value is too small: El valor de este campo es demasiado pequeño
es-ES.This value is too large: El valor de este campo es demasiado grande
es-ES.This is not a valid email: El email introducido no es válido
es-ES.Toggle the text area to HTML source code: Cambiar la zona de texto por código fuente HTML / Área de texto enriquecido
es-ES.Heading: Título
es-ES.Quote/unquote selection or paragraph: Citar / no citar selección o párrafo
es-ES.Please enter an image URL to insert: Por favor ingrese una URL de imagen para insertar
es-ES.Please enter a youtube URL to embed: Por favor, introduzca una URL de youtube para incrustar
es-ES.Please enter a URL to insert: Por favor ingrese una URL para insertar
es-ES.The requested content cannot be loaded.<:
El contenido solicitado no puede mostrarse.
Por favor, intente otra vez más tarde

ja-JP.This is the default application home pag: This is the default application home page
ja-JP.An application is a collection of pages: An application is a collection of pages and processes that meets a business need. It contains some or all of the following:
ja-JP.the frame in which application pages are: the frame in which application pages are displayed.
ja-JP.the user interface components of the app: the user interface components of the application. An application must contain at least one page.
ja-JP.the logic execution components of the ap: the logic execution components of the application. An application must contain at least one process.
ja-JP.which are the user interface of the proc: which are the user interface of the process.
ja-JP.called from pages or forms to retrieve d: called from pages or forms to retrieve data to be presented to the user.
ja-JP.the appearance of application pages, inc: the appearance of application pages, including fonts and colors.
ja-JP.The definition of applications should be: The definition of applications should be done from the studio, which makes it more straightforward to develop and package with other application artifacts.
ja-JP.For Enterprise, Efficiency and Performan: For Enterprise, Efficiency and Performance editions, a graphical editor is provided on top of xml source code.
ja-JP.Title: タイトル
ja-JP.Default label: デフォルト ラベル
ja-JP.Select an option: オプションを選択してください
ja-JP.Name: 名前

ja-JP.This field length should be smaller: This field length should be smaller

ja-JP.Toggle the text area to HTML source code: Toggle the text area to HTML source code / Rich text area
ja-JP.Please enter an image URL to insert: Please enter an image URL to insert
ja-JP.Please enter a youtube URL to embed: Please enter a youtube URL to embed
ja-JP.Please enter a URL to insert: Please enter a URL to insert

The requested content cannot be loaded.
Please try again later.

pt-BR.This is the default application home pag: Esta é a home page da aplicação padrão
pt-BR.An application is a collection of pages: Uma aplicação é uma coleção de páginas e processos que atende a uma necessidade de negócio. Ele contém alguns ou todos os itens a seguir:
pt-BR.the frame in which application pages are: o quadro no qual as páginas da aplicação são exibidas.
pt-BR.the user interface components of the app: os componentes da interface do usuário da aplicação. Uma aplicação deve conter pelo menos uma página.
pt-BR.the logic execution components of the ap: os componentes de execução lógica da aplicação. Uma aplicação deve conter pelo menos um processo.
pt-BR.which are the user interface of the proc: que são a interface do usuário do processo.
pt-BR.called from pages or forms to retrieve d: chamado de páginas ou formulários para recuperar dados a serem apresentados ao usuário.
pt-BR.the appearance of application pages, inc: a aparência das páginas da aplicação, incluindo fontes e cores.
pt-BR.The definition of applications should be: A definição de aplicações deve ser feita a partir do estúdio, o que torna mais simples o desenvolvimento e empacotamento com outros artefatos da aplicação.
pt-BR.For Enterprise, Efficiency and Performan: Para edições Enterprise, Efficiency e Performance, um editor gráfico é fornecido sobre o código-fonte xml.
